import hmac
import hashlib
import time
import requests

api_key = ''CT5wmMvyeRzANwDgqB0Gymg0bu07xHhp91DfzgHkMMC8ibDcrddXjXLv4mPf44hg''
api_secret = ''7ACFUWNoAyTSWSHnuOST2sOWADGMSHbVay9YDz9W9pirSLoovA5GBsgv8tUxY55M''

timestamp = int\(time.time\(\) * 1000\)
query_string = f''timestamp={timestamp}&recvWindow=10000''
signature = hmac.new\(api_secret.encode\(\), query_string.encode\(\), hashlib.sha256\).hexdigest\(\)

url = f''https://fapi.binance.com/fapi/v2/balance?{query_string}&signature={signature}''
headers = {''X-MBX-APIKEY'': api_key}

response = requests.get\(url, headers=headers\)
print\(f''Status: {response.status_code}''\)
print\(f''Response: {response.text[:500]}''\)
")

import hmac
import hashlib
import time
import requests

api_key = ''CT5wmMvyeRzANwDgqB0Gymg0bu07xHhp91DfzgHkMMC8ibDcrddXjXLv4mPf44hg''
api_secret = ''7ACFUWNoAyTSWSHnuOST2sOWADGMSHbVay9YDz9W9pirSLoovA5GBsgv8tUxY55M''

timestamp = int\(time.time\(\) * 1000\)
query_string = f''timestamp={timestamp}&recvWindow=10000''
signature = hmac.new\(api_secret.encode\(\), query_string.encode\(\), hashlib.sha256\).hexdigest\(\)

# Demo trading endpoint deneyelim
url = f''https://testnet.binancefuture.com/fapi/v2/balance?{query_string}&signature={signature}''
headers = {''X-MBX-APIKEY'': api_key}

response = requests.get\(url, headers=headers\)
print\(f''Status: {response.status_code}''\)
print\(f''Response: {response.text[:500]}''\)
